short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate xkcd.com with your keyboard, one-handed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xkcd-pad is a small extension for navigating the comics on xkcd.com. The following actions and their appropriate shortcuts are below.

Show alt-text (space)
Back one comic (left arrow)
Forward one comic (right arrow)
Jump to comic #1 (< [less than])
Jump to the latest comic (> [greater than])
Go to a random comic (? [question mark])

I have no affiliation with xkcd or Randall Munroe; I'm just a fan and wanted an easy way to navigate the comics with one hand so I can eat a sandwich at the same time.
